dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 25,000,095 reviews made by 162,541 reviewers on 59,047 movies. It was preprocessed by grouping reviews by reviewers and sorting them by timestamp, with the last review selected for testing, the second last for validation, and all remaining reviews for training.
dcterms:title: MovieLens 25M

dcterms:creator: Xu Xie

Bin Cui
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 192,464,864 reviews made by 47,249,276 reviewers on 14,894,121 products. It was split into train, validation, and test sets based on timestamp by 80%, 10%, and 10% respectively.
dcterms:title: Amazon review dataset
